long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension puts all your most-used links and resources at your fingertips, saving you valuable time and effort.

- Quick access to essential tools: AESOP, Powerschool for Teachers, Schoology, Clever for Teachers, Help Center, Work Order system, and Vector PD
- Organized and easy-to-navigate interface: No more searching through endless bookmarks or folders.
- Always up-to-date: Never worry about links being broken or outdated.
- One-click convenience: Access your most used resources instantly, without having to open multiple tabs.
- Saves you time and effort: Spend less time searching and more time focusing on what matters most - your students.
